remarks: The set of closed projective subspaces in a Hilbert lattice. (Contributed by NM, 23-Jan-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
psubclset.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
psubclset.p $e |- ._|_ = ( _|_P ` K ) $.
psubclset.c $e |- C = ( PSubCl ` K ) $.
psubclsetN $p |- ( K e. B -> C = { s | ( s C_ A /\ ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` s ) ) = s ) } ) $.
$d A s $.
$d K s $.
